column1: The New Row was a row of hobbit-holes cut into the southern face of Hobbiton Hill after the War of the Ring. They were made to replace Bagshot Row
column2: which had been destroyed by Ruffians.  It became a jest in Bywater to refer to New Row as "Sharkeys End"

column1: After the restoration the Gaffer Gamgee returned to Number 3
column2: and his son Samwise Gamgee lived with him until Sam married Rose Cotton and relocated to Bag End.
